member.name: T:Binarysharp.Maths.Complex
member.summary: Represents a complex number.

member.name: M:Binarysharp.Maths.Complex.#ctor(System.Double,System.Double)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of using the specified real and imaginary values.
member.param: The real part of the complex number.
The imaginary part of the complex number.

member.name: M:Binarysharp.Maths.Complex.Conjugate
member.summary: Computes the conjugate of a complex number and returns the result.
member.returns: The conjugate of the complex number.

member.name: M:Binarysharp.Maths.Complex.Equals(Binarysharp.Maths.Complex)
member.summary: Indicates whether the current object is equal to another object of the same type.

member.name: M:Binarysharp.Maths.Complex.Equals(System.Object)
member.summary: Determines whether the specified object is equal to the current object.

member.name: M:Binarysharp.Maths.Complex.FromPolarCoordinates(System.Double,System.Double)
member.summary: Creates a complex number from a point's polar coordinates.
member.param: The magnitude, which is the distance from the origin (the intersection of the x-axis and the y-axis) to the number.
The phase, which is the angle from the line to the horizontal axis, measured in radians.

member.name: M:Binarysharp.Maths.Complex.GetHashCode
member.summary: Serves as a hash function for a particular type.

member.name: M:Binarysharp.Maths.Complex.op_Equality(Binarysharp.Maths.Complex,Binarysharp.Maths.Complex)
member.summary: Overloads the equality operator.

member.name: M:Binarysharp.Maths.Complex.op_Inequality(Binarysharp.Maths.Complex,Binarysharp.Maths.Complex)
member.summary: Overloads the inequality operator.

member.name: M:Binarysharp.Maths.Complex.op_Addition(Binarysharp.Maths.Complex,Binarysharp.Maths.Complex)
member.summary: Overloads the addition operator.

member.name: M:Binarysharp.Maths.Complex.op_Subtraction(Binarysharp.Maths.Complex,Binarysharp.Maths.Complex)
member.summary: Overloads the subtraction operator.

member.name: M:Binarysharp.Maths.Complex.op_Multiply(Binarysharp.Maths.Complex,Binarysharp.Maths.Complex)
member.summary: Overloads the multiplication operator.

member.name: M:Binarysharp.Maths.Complex.op_Division(Binarysharp.Maths.Complex,Binarysharp.Maths.Complex)
member.summary: Overloads the division operator.

member.name: M:Binarysharp.Maths.Complex.Power(System.Double)
member.summary: Returns the complex number raised to a power specified by a double-precision floating-point number.
member.param: A double-precision floating-point number that specifies a power.
member.returns: The complex number raised to the specified power.

member.name: M:Binarysharp.Maths.Complex.FirstRoot(System.Double)
member.summary: Return the first root of the complex number using a double-precision floating-point number.
member.param: A double-precision floating-point number that specifies a root.

member.name: M:Binarysharp.Maths.Complex.AllRoots(System.Double)
member.summary: Returns all nth roots of the complex number using a double-precision floating-point number.
member.param: A double-precision floating-point number that specifies a root.
member.returns: An array of nth roots of the complex number.

member.name: M:Binarysharp.Maths.Complex.SolveQuadraticEquation(System.Double,System.Double,System.Double)
member.summary: Solves a quadratic equation with real coefficients written in the form: ax^2 + bx + c = 0.
member.param: The quadratic coefficient (must be different from zero).

member.name: M:Binarysharp.Maths.Complex.ToString
member.summary: Returns a string that represents the current object.

member.name: P:Binarysharp.Maths.Complex.Argument
member.summary: Gets the argument of the complex number.

member.name: P:Binarysharp.Maths.Complex.Imaginary
member.summary: Gets the imaginary part of the complex number.

member.name: P:Binarysharp.Maths.Complex.Modulus
member.summary: Gets the modulus of the complex number.

member.name: P:Binarysharp.Maths.Complex.Quadrant
member.summary: Gets a value indicating in which quadrant the complex number is.

member.name: P:Binarysharp.Maths.Complex.Real
member.summary: Gets the real part of the complex number.
